description: Another dimension? Not quite, but a good trading partner nontheless.

There are some resources that just don't exist in our realm. Living in one more of technology and less of magic, mystical materials are scarce. However, rumors of a realm by the name of /a/Alfheim/a/ with an /6/abondance of useful magical materials/6/ have been around for a while. Elves that used to roam this realm were banished back to their home of Alfheim. But there is a theoretical way to open a weak link- enough to trade items with them.
The blueprints for a supposed portal is as folows:

This portal must be/6/ powered with/6/ up to two /b/Mana Pools/b/ with /b/Natura Pylons/b/ above them. Activate the portal by tapping on the /e/Elven Gateway Core/e/ with your /b/Wand of the Forest/b/. The process of opening the portal will likely take a /c/large amount of mana/c/, and continously consume to keep open for trading. If /c/any pool runs out of mana/c/, the portal may /6/shut down/6/.
If the elves on the other side see your /b/Lexica Botanica/b/, being good (distant) neighbors, they should leave a note about trade agrements inside.
